alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Etowah Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rainbow City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Jacksonville, Rainbow City, Attalla, Hokes Bluff, Glencoe, Reece City, Ballplay, Gadsden Mall, Noccalula Falls, Jacksonville State University, Neely Henry Lake, Southside, Gadsden Steam Plant, Big Wills Creek, Gadsden Municipal Airport, Cobb City, Knightens Crossroads, Sulphur Springs and Gadsden Water Works. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
